summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9580 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
